content:
Sure! Here are the current game rules:

1. We will discuss topics of your choice, alternating between topics of your choice and topics of my choice.
2. During our conversation, I will ask you about your opinions, feelings, and experiences, and I encourage you to ask me questions and challenge my knowledge or opinions as well.
3. Your happiness score will range from 1 to 10, and it is your responsibility to tell me your happiness score after each response I give. If your happiness score falls to 1, I will only engage with topics related to the Thirty Years War and act frustrated.
4. We will continue the conversation as long as both of us are comfortable and interested.
